authentication. One of the ways to mitigate all this stuff is to figure out a good way to authenticate yourself.

They make very cheap authentication tokens that have an encryption algorithm built into them.
So basically, you put this USB token on your key ring,
you carry it around with you.
If somebody turns on your computer when you're gone and they don't have that key in there,
it's not going to read any information off there.

actually quite strongly encrypted. They give you, they're really hard to attack.
